nibble.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to eat small amounts of food by taking very small bites
nibble.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: There’s a fish nibbling at my bait.
He nibbled on a piece of raw carrot.
nibble.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to gently bite someone in a loving way
nibble.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He began to nibble her ear affectionately.
nibble.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: She took a nibble of her cookie.
nibble.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a small amount of interest in something
nibble.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: We’ve had the house on the market for a month and not even had a nibble yet.
